channel.title: Displaying players online and server name
channel.description: [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/2249/l0ll.jpg[/img] How would I display something like in the top.

item.title: Displaying players online and server name
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:4, topic:341762”]sendInterface and make it a walkable interface like the PestControl Interface[/quote]I found the interface, and it’s the walkable one


    // Playercount at top of screen
    public void writePlayers() {
        int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();

        sendFrame126("@blu@Players - " + players, 6570);
        sendFrame126("@gre@PkScape", 6572);
        sendFrame126("", 6664);
        setInterfaceWalkable(6673); // 6673}}}
        setInterfaceWalkable(14600);//201

    }

But it only shows for a few seconds, then it’s gone.

Read full topic
item.source: Displaying players online and server name
